00057 char file_add(const string &in_fn, const char *rm) {
00058     ipfstream in(in_fn.c_str());
00059     bool enoent = false;
00060     if( ! in ) {
00061             if( errno != ENOENT ) return 111; 
00062             enoent = true;
00063     }
00064     string out_fn(in_fn+'.'+uniq());
00065     opfstream out(out_fn.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00066     if( ! out ) return 111;
00067     
00068     string ln, lncmp(*rm ? rm : "");
00069     if( ! enoent ) {
00070             while(getline(in, ln)) {
00071                     if(ln == lncmp) {
00072                             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00073                             return 1;
00074                     }
00075                     out<<ln<<endl;
00076                     if( ! out ) {
00077                             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00078                             return 111;
00079                     }
00080             }
00081             if( in.bad() ) {
00082                     unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00083                     return 111;
00084             }
00085     }
00086     out<<lncmp<<endl;
00087     out.close();
00088     if( ! out ) {
00089             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00090             return 111;
00091     }
00092     
00093     if( ! enoent ) {
00094             struct stat st;
00095             if( fstat(in.rdbuf()->fd(), &st)
00096                 || chown(out_fn.c_str(), st.st_uid, st.st_gid)
00097                 || chmod(out_fn.c_str(), st.st_mode & 07777) ) {
00098                     unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00099                     return 111;
00100             }
00101     } else if( chmod(out_fn.c_str(), ac_qmail_mode.val_int()) ) {
00102             unlink(out_fn.c_str());
00103             return 111;
00104     }
00105             
00106     return rename(out_fn.c_str(), in_fn.c_str()) ? 111 : 0;
00107 }

00109 int main( int ac , char ** av ) {
00110         try {
00111                 if( ac != 2 ) {
00112                         cerr<<"usage: "<<*av<<" line_to_add"<<endl
00113                             <<"Program adds a line to morercpthosts file."<<endl
00114                             <<"Does not add if file include given line."<<endl
00115                             <<"If morercpthosts file was changed it calls qmail-newmrh."<<endl
00116                             <<"Program returns 0 on success, 1 if file was not changed,"<<endl
00117                             <<"anything else on error."<<endl;
00118                         return 111;
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 string fn(ac_qmail.val_str()+"/control/morercpthosts");
00122 
00123                 opfstream lck((fn+".lock").c_str());
00124                 if( ! lck ) return 111;
00125         
00126                 if( lock_exnb(lck.rdbuf()->fd()) ) return 111;
00127     
00128                 char ret = file_add(fn, av[1]);
00129                 switch(ret) {
00130                 case 1: return 1;
00131                 case 0: break;
00132                 default:
00133                         return ret;
00134                 }
00135                 
00136                 pid_t pid;
00137                 string newu(ac_qmail.val_str()+"/bin/qmail-newmrh");
00138                 char * const args[] = {
00139                         const_cast<char *>(newu.c_str()),
00140                         NULL
00141                 };
00142                         
00143                 switch((pid=vfork())) {
00144                 case -1: 
00145                         return 111;
00146                 case 0:
00147                         execv(*args, args);
00148                         _exit(111);
00149                 }
00150                 while( wait(&pid) == -1 && errno == EINTR );
00151                 if( ! WIFEXITED(pid) || WEXITSTATUS(pid) ) return 111;
00152                 return 0;
00153         } catch(...) {
00154                 return 111;
00155         }
00156 }
